name: 5A Custom Coloring 3 and 4 Bundles (Full Color)
description: These are simply the prices for the custom coloring. Add the hair (type, length and texture) to your cart first; and then based upon the grade (5A or 6A), whether you want Ombre or Full Color, and the lengths of your hair- choose the lengths accordingly and add it to your cart for checkout also. Once I confirm your order, you tell me which color you would like your hair.

name: 5A Lace Closures (All hair types)
description:
Lace Closures come in all hair types, in all patterns except "Loose Wave"
The image shown is body wave with its lace closure (Click picture to view up close)
-For more closure images go to the "Billion Boutique Lace Closures" tab
-For 3 Bundle deals WITH closures, contact me

name: 5A Brazilian 3 Bundle Deals with Lace Closures Included
description:
The image shown is silky straight with its closure
The 3 bundle deals and closure combos are all there to help you spend less if you need 3 bundles and a closure instead of paying more for them separately :)
NOTE: IF THE COMBINATION YOU WOULD LIKE ISN'T LISTED, THAT MEANS THERE IS NO COMBO DEAL FOR IT, YOU MUST PURCHASE IT SEPARATELY!
